inputsClass.name: iconOverrides
inputsClass.rawdescription:
List of overriden icons as TemplateRef. Also default icons could be overriden.
 The given overriden icons will replace an icon with matching state: StepState

<ng-container
*ngSwitchCase="true"
[ngTemplateOutlet]="iconOverrides[state]"
></ng-container>
inputsClass.description:
List of overriden icons as TemplateRef. Also default icons could be overriden. The given overriden icons will replace an icon with matching state: StepState

inputsClass.name: index
inputsClass.rawdescription: The index of the current step

inputsClass.name: selected
inputsClass.rawdescription: Whether the step is currently selected or not
inputsClass.description: Whether the step is currently selected or not

inputsClass.name: state
inputsClass.rawdescription: The current state of the step

outputsClass.rawdescription: Emits the index: number of the step which was clicked

methodsClass.name: stepSelected
methodsClass.rawdescription: Called on click and emits the step index
methodsClass.description: Called on click and emits the step index
